sentence: For  the  few  that  remain,  attacks  like  Monday's  have  become  routine  â€”  especially  over  the  past  week,  as  rocket  fire  and  aerial  attacks  from  both  sides  of  the  border  have  ramped  up  after  a  strike  in  Lebanon's  capital  of  Beirut  killed  a  top  Hamas  official.
Across  northern  Israel,  four  civilians  and  nine  soldiers  have  been  killed  since  Oct.  7,  according  to  media  reports  citing  Israeli  officials.
